unknown.error: An unknown error occurred, please try again later.

sql.optimization.completed: SQL optimization is complete. You can view the detailed report in the web browser.
NO_WORKSPACE: There are currently no available workspaces. Please ensure you are logged in to the PawSQL website with the account associated with the configured API key to create a workspace.
NO_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE: The default workspace has not been configured. Please configure it at the top of the sql file, or set the global default workspace in the PawSQL Workspace Manager
WORKSPACE_SELECTOR_PLACEHOLDER: Please select a workspace to optimize
CONFIG_FILE_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE_PLACEHOLDE: Please select a workspace as the default workspace for files
error.backendUrl.invalid: Please check if backendUrl is correctly configured or if the server is running.
error.frontendUrl.invalid: Please check if frontendUrl is correctly configured or if the server is running.
license.code.not.valid: The license code is invalid. Please contact the administrator to obtain it.
